import styles from './myPage.module.scss' import TopNavBar from 'components/TopNavBar' import { PersonIcon, HeartIcon, CartIcon, TruckIcon, SettingIcon } from 'assets/svgs' import { MouseEvent } from 'react' import { userInfoState } from 'states/userInfo' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useRecoilValue } from 'recoil' import { useRecoil } from 'hooks/state' import { themeState } from 'states/system' import cx from 'classnames' const User = () => { const userInfo = useRecoilValue(userInfoState) const navigate = useNavigate() const [theme, setTheme] = useRecoil(themeState) const handleChangeTheme = () => { if (theme === 'light') setTheme('dark') else setTheme('light') } const [isToggleChecked, setIsToggleChecked] = useState(false) const clickToggle = () => { setIsToggleChecked((prev) => !prev) } return (
{userInfo.userName} ({userInfo.userId})

) } export default User
